summary: This document is an email from Stacie Hitchens regarding the submission of individual and business tax returns for various corporations to a private banking entity. It includes a follow-up flag and indicates that the information is confidential.

persons.name: Stacie Hitchens
persons.context: Stacie Hitchens is the sender of the email, discussing the submission of tax returns for various corporations.

persons.name: JoAnn Brown
persons.context: JoAnn Brown is copied on the email regarding the submission of tax returns.

keyFacts: The email was sent on October 15, 2014.
Stacie Hitchens is associated with Fifth Third Mortgage.
The email discusses the submission of tax returns for multiple corporations.
The document is marked as confidential.
There are attachments related to individual and business returns.
